description.lang: RF Controlled Plug-in Dimmer with 2 outlets, both independently controlled with 3.4A USB Charging

inclusionNote.lang: Once the controller is ready to include your smart dimmer, single press and release the manual/program button on the smart dimmer to include it in the network.

deviceDescription.productName: Plug-in Dual Smart Dimmer With USB Charging

description.lang: Depending upon your primary controller, the dimmer switch can be set to respond to ALL ON and ALL OFF commands in up to four different ways.
It will respond to ALL ON and the ALL OFF command.
It will not respond to ALL ON or ALL OFF commands.
It will respond to the ALL OFF command but will not respond to the ALL ON command.
It will respond to the ALL ON command but will not respond to the ALL OFF command.

name.lang: Dim Rate Adjustments Endpoint 1 Number of Steps

description.lang: Both the number of steps (or levels) that the dimmer will change and the timing of the steps can be modified to suit personal preferences. The timing of the steps can be adjusted in 10 millisecond intervals. As an example, the default setting for parameter 8 is “3”. This means that the lighting level will change every 30 milliseconds when the Dim Command is received. A value of 255 would mean that the level would change every 2.55 seconds. Combined, the two parameters allow dim rate adjustments from 10 milliseconds to 4.2 minutes to go from maximum-to-minimum or minimum-to-maximum brightness levels.

name.lang: Dim Rate Adjustments Endpoint 1 Timing of Steps

description.lang: Both the number of steps (or levels) that the dimmer will change and the timing of the steps can be modified to suit personal preferences. The timing of the steps can be adjusted in 10 millisecond intervals. As an example, the default setting for parameter 8 is “3”. This means that the lighting level will change every 30 milliseconds when the Dim Command is received. A value of 255 would mean that the level would change every 2.55 seconds. Combined, the two parameters allow dim rate adjustments from 10 milliseconds to 4.2 minutes to go from maximum-to-minimum or minimum-to-maximum brightness levels.
Define the timing of the steps.

name.lang: Dim Rate Adjustments ALL Command Speed

description.lang: When Receiving an All-On or All-Off Command

name.lang: Dim Rate Adjustments ALL Command Timer

description.lang: When Receiving an All-On or All-Off Command
